title: Zone-Level Access identity providers
description: Identity providers are services that authenticate users to Access applications. (Note: We recommend using the equivalent account-level endpoints at https://api.cloudflare.com/#access-identity-providers-properties. Account APIs provide a broader range of features and are backwards-compatible to zone APIs.)

links.title: Add an Access identity provider
links.description: Adds a new identity provider to Access.
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/identity_providers" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"Widget Corps OTP","type":"onetimepin","config":{}}'

name.description: The name of the identity provider, shown to users on the login page.

type.description: The type of identity provider. To determine the value for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

config.description: The configuration parameters for the identity provider. To view the required parameters for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

links.title: Update an Access identity provider
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/identity_providers/f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"Widget Corps OTP","type":"onetimepin","config":{}}'

name.description: The name of the identity provider, shown to users on the login page.

type.description: The type of identity provider. To determine the value for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

config.description: The configuration parameters for the identity provider. To view the required parameters for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

links.title: Delete an Access identity provider
links.description: Deletes an identity provider from Access.

name.description: The name of the identity provider, shown to users on the login page.

type.description: The type of identity provider. To determine the value for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

config.description: The configuration parameters for the identity provider. To view the required parameters for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).
